title: Whenever I log onto my account is gives me attempting to reconnect
body: Any idea whats wrong with it lol

replies.body: You might be having some issues with a ghost game as well. We've been seeing an abnormal amount of them lately, but essentially the last game you played never recorded the ending of the match, therefore the client still thinks it's active. After waiting a bit that should clear up and let you requeue for games.
